attributes.action: Call a byelection for Brecon and Radnorshire constituency.
attributes.background: The sitting MP Chris Davies submitted claims for expenses as an MP that were fraudulent. This was proved in court. This behaviour is totally inappropriate for a sitting MP. Under parlimentary rules if more than 10% of the electorate of his constituency sign this petition a byelection must be held.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the parliamentary e-petitions site isn't where you sign a petition to recall a Member of Parliament. Recall petitions are run by your local authority.

You can find details on how to sign the recall petition for Brecon and Radnorshire here:

https://en.powys.gov.uk/article/7270/Public-notice-of-petition-to-remove-the-MP-for-Brecon-and-Radnorshire-Chris-Davies
